items.name: Component_TextBehavior
items.content: # =================================================================== # # Script: Component_TextBehavior # # $$COPYRIGHT$$ # # =================================================================== class Component_TextBehavior extends gs.Component @memoryUsage: 0 ###* * Called if this object instance is restored from a data-bundle. It can be used * re-assign event-handler, anonymous functions, etc. * * @method onDataBundleRestore. * @param Object data - The data-bundle * @param gs.ObjectCodecContext context - The codec-context. ### onDataBundleRestore: (data, context) -> if @renderedLines size = @object.textRenderer.measureFormattedLines(@renderedLines, @object.wordWrap ? yes) @refreshWithSize(size) @refreshBitmap() @object.textRenderer.drawFormattedLines(@padding.left, @padding.top, @padding.right, @padding.bottom, @renderedLines, @object.wordWrap ? yes) else @refresh(true) ###* * * * @module gs * @class Component_TextBehavior * @extends gs.Component * @memberof gs * @constructor ### constructor: () -> super() ###* * The current text displayed. * @property text * @type string * @protected ### @text = "" @renderedLines = null ###* * The space around the text. * @property padding * @type string * @protected ### @padding = new ui.Space(6, 0, 6, 0); ###* * The font used for text-rendering. * @property font * @type string * @protected ### @font = new Font(gs.Fonts.TEXT) ###* * Standard Format String which can be used if the text represents a number value. * Example: If the text is "3" and format is "%0d3" then 003 is the displayed text. * @property format * @type string * @protected ### @format = null ###* * Disposes the component and bitmap. * * @method dispose ### dispose: -> if @object.bitmap? @object.bitmap.dispose() @object.bitmap = null ###* * Redraws the texts on game object's bitmap. * * @method redraw ### redraw: -> if @text? @object.bitmap.clear() @object.bitmap.font = @object.font text = lcs(@text) if @format? text = sprintf(@format, text) if @object.formatting @renderedLines = @object.textRenderer.drawFormattedText(@padding.left, @padding.top, @padding.right, @padding.bottom, text, @object.wordWrap ? yes) else @object.textRenderer.drawText(@padding.left, @padding.top, @padding.right, @padding.bottom, text) ###* * Updates the game object's dstRect so that the text fits in. That only works * if the game object's sizeToFit property is set. * * @method refreshSize ### refreshSize: -> if not @object.text? then return @text = @object.text text = lcs(@object.text).toString() if @format? text = sprintf(@format, text) if @object.sizeToFit @object.font = @object.font || @font if @object.formatting size = @object.textRenderer.measureFormattedText(text, @object.wordWrap ? yes) else size = @object.textRenderer.measureText(text) @refreshWithSize(size) ###* * Updates the game object's dstRect with the specified text size. * * @param {gs.Size} size - The text size to resize the game object for. * @method refreshWithSize ### refreshWithSize: (size) -> if !(@object.sizeToFit.horizontal?) or @object.sizeToFit.horizontal @object.dstRect.width = size.width + @padding.right + @padding.left if !(@object.sizeToFit.vertical?) or @object.sizeToFit.vertical @object.dstRect.height = size.height + @padding.bottom + @padding.top ###* * Recreates and clears the game object's bitmap if necessary. * * @method refreshBitmap ### refreshBitmap: -> width = @object.bitmap?.width || 0 height = @object.bitmap?.height || 0 if(!@object.bitmap or width != @object.dstRect.width or height != @object.dstRect.height) @object.bitmap?.dispose() @object.bitmap = new Bitmap(@object.dstRect.width , @object.dstRect.height) else @object.bitmap.clear() @object.bitmap.font = @object.font ###* * Refreshes the texts on game object's bitmap. If the text or font has not been * changed, no refresh will happen. * * @method refresh * @param {boolean} force - If set to true it will force redrawing the text even if the * text and font has not been changed. ### refresh: (force) -> fontChange = !@font.compare(@object.font) if !@object.text? or (!force and @object.text == @text and !fontChange) then return @font.set(@object.font) if fontChange @refreshSize() @refreshBitmap() @srcRect = new Rect(0, 0, @object.dstRect.width , @object.dstRect.height) @object.srcRect = @srcRect @redraw() ###* * Action to append a specified text. * * @method addText * @param {Object} sender - The sender of the action. * @param {Object} params - The action's parameters. ### addText: (sender, params) -> @object.text += ui.Component_FormulaHandler.fieldValue(sender, params.text) ###* * Updates the component. Checks if the game object's bitmap needs a refresh * and maybe disposes the bitmap if the game object's is out of the * screen and memory usage is too high. * * @method update ### update: -> super visible = @object.visual.visible if (!@object.bitmap or @object.bitmap.width != @object.dstRect.width or @object.bitmap.height != @object.dstRect.height or lcs(@object.text)?.toString() != lcs(@text)) @refresh() gs.Component_TextBehavior = Component_TextBehavior
